name: Bosc La Riba parking and activities
title: (08519) Bosc La Riba parking and activities
title_short: (08519) Bosc La Riba parking and activities
description: We are Bosc la Riba, by Mas La Riba, a family business based on cattle breeding and the forestry sector. We open the doors of our farm to you to offer you leisure and sports activities in nature, within our property. Visits to the farm and its surroundings. We allow overnight stays in our Visitors Parking. Starting point of the Tavertet GR2 hike. Distance from the Sau dam 900 m in the area of Pineda Xica and 1,400 m in the esplai pantà area of Sau i Club Nautico Vic-Sau. We have 8 electrical connection points, a water source and a dry toilet. Water loading and unloading services in the city area (7 km). Good access and flat. Privileged location! With CCTV.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Rupit

description: Automatic laundry, with coins or credit card. Washing machines and drying machines.

name: Rupit
title: (08569) Rupit
description: Rupit i Pruit, C-153. Camping. It is very close to Rupit. Well.

title: (08569) Pruit - C-153
description: The passage from the asphalt to the road has too much unevenness for a motorhome. Only accessible for 4x4 or slightly elevated vehicles. The flattest place is at the end of the road, which is the access to a field. Shady and very quiet. Suitable for one night.

title: (17177) Els Hostalets d'en Bas - 105 Lloc Hostalets Bas

title: (08519) Malla - 64 C-17

title: (17176) Vall den Bas - 53 Diseminado Despoblado
description: Good motorhome area. Free parking and paid services.  Card payment. Free emptying of gray and black water. It is next to the road but little traffic at night. Thanks to the hostel for the initiative!!

title: (17500) Ripoll - 16 Passeig de la Farga Catalana
title_short: (17500) Ripoll - 16 Passeig de la Farga Catalana
description: Next to the center to visit.

Laundromat with the possibility of paying by credit card / debit card.
No parking nearby.

Starting point for hikes

we parked there for the night it is very quiet

name: Ripoll Can Guetes

description: Ripoll Can Guetes. Ripoll area, drain and water (free!). Parking possible (24h), but most of them sloping :-( If in all cities it could also be realized. Directly in the city center. It is great and clean.  Free Wi-Fi spot. There is a park for dogs, even.

name: Càmping El Pont
title: (08519) Càmping El Pont
description: Camping El Pont with everything available. Restaurant and bar with pool. Very close to the river and beautiful green area, nature, quiet mountain area.

title: (17512) Les Llosses - C-26
description: Shaded siding for lounging. It is right next to the road. We only had a nap but we think we could sleep. Further on there is another larger siding but we consider this to be flatter. As the day passes, the shadow grows wider.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 1 Avinguda del Comte Guifré
description: Cemetery car park. Near the center. Very calm. There is no service, but to visit Ripoll it is fantastic. In the evening there is the lighting of solar street lamps.

title: (17174) La Fàbrega -
description:
Port d'Uria. following the road that goes from Sant Esteve d'en Bas to Rupit. Space next to the road. Parking departure excursions.
During the day the highway transits, especially motorcycles, but at night it is deserted.
No services. 5/6 seats quite level. The rest with chocks.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 70 C-151A
description: Car park on the outskirts of Ripoll, in a business area. No services, except for two tables with benches to sit on.

description: Campsite MOLÍ Bojons

title: (08514) Llusá - BV-4341, s/n

title: (17512) Les Llosses -
description: Stumbled upon it by chance on our way. Nice and quiet place with site for motorhome. Point for walks and church. No water.

title: (08504) Sant Sadurní d'Osormort - 3 BV-5201
description: Flat place to spend the night near the Moli de Bojons hostel.

name: Mas Casablanca
title: (08552) Mas Casablanca
description: Name: MAS CASABLANCA, Type: Furgoperfecto, Free: No -, Drinking water: Yes, WC: Yes, 41°52'50.2"N 2°17'13.9"E 41.880618, 2.287201 Description of the area: The area for vans and caravans, is the parking that is part of the farm facilities there. The farm has been open for years for visits. There is a picnic area with tables and benches. The site is beautiful and at the same time quiet, it is very close to the Montseny routes and very well connected with the rest of the region. Just 6 km from Vic. It is easily accessible with any vehicle. You can spend the night. In order to spend the night, it is mandatory to do one of the types of visits they make to the farm, free or guided. A visit to the farm is highly recommended. Before you go, call to see if it's open and they have a seat.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 103 Carretera Ribes
description: Large shaded company car park next to the river. Ideal to make a technical stop. There is no barrier, no height limit and very flat.

title: (08513) Prats de Lluçanès -
description: Motorhome area with toilets and showers, market on Sundays.

title: (17174) San Felíu de Pallarols - 42 C-153
description: Health sanctuary car park. No services.

name: Càmping les Preses Natura
title: (17178) Càmping les Preses Natura
description: Small but cozy campsite, practically full of families with babies. We were very comfortable one night. 7.50 per person and 8.50 per van

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat

title: (08514) Lluçà - 17 BV-4341
description: Nice for a night

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341

name: Camping Puigcercós

description: Camping Puigcercós in the municipality of Borredà is located on the banks of the Merlès stream with some beautiful pools for swimming and to be able to go on beautiful excursions.

title: (08552) Taradell - 2P Plaça Sector Fabrica Iglesias
description: Quiet car park with enough places to visit the area, nearby there are trails and routes to walk. Good stopping point en route!

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341
description: A small flat place for a VAN, at the edge of a ridge runway, very beautiful panorama. Tranquility guaranteed, but you should not hesitate to do 3 km of track from the C62 road (GPS 42.0273 / 2.0227), track in fairly good condition. Another small place 100m further on the other side of the track.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - Unnamed Road

title: (17513) Les Llosses - Unnamed Road
description: Just 100 meters from the main asphalt track. Accessible by van via dirt road.

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341
description: Quiet and secluded area in the middle of nature. On the same track there are many sidings where to spend the night. We choose to be well leveled. Some vehicles pass that must be neighbors of nearby towns. in the morning some cyclists. Adequate place to rest and disconnect, and do some sport the next morning.

name: Camping Ripollès
title: (17500) Camping Ripollès
description: Camping on a slope. Relatively narrow and steep access. Not suitable for campers too long. Friendly staff. With bar, restaurant and playground (indoor and outdoor).

name: Càmping La Vall d'Hostoles
title: (17174) Càmping La Vall d'Hostoles
description: Family camping, petit i molt tranquil, no hi have pets or sorolls. Molt recommendable if you vols disconnect a few days. To the mateix coast of the via verda Olot/Girona, and also hiking trails. Serveis i dutxa molt nets, fins i all rental and barbecue.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - s/n Parc de l'Estació

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 25 Carretera d'Ogassa
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 25 Carretera d'Ogassa
description: Quiet parking, a bit out of town, but ideal for visiting the malatosca gorg. We spent a quiet night together with other motorhomes. Local police passed through the area several times. They greeted and no problem.

title: (08517) Santa Maria de Merlès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08517) Santa Maria de Merlès - Unnamed Road

title: (08606) Borredà - Unnamed Road
description: Site very close to the campsite. Nearby you have some very nice pools to bathe.

title: (08551) Tona - 118 Carrer Sant Andreu
description: Small parking area. It is on the outskirts of town, right in front of a large park with trees and picnic tables. It also has a barbecue and a small river.

name: Camping Riera Merles
title: (08606) Camping Riera Merles
description: Highly recommended family campsite. A few minutes away you will find the river and different pools to bathe. We will come back for sure

title: (17166) Susqueda -
description: Parking for 5 or 6 vehicles, at the foot of the road, with views towards Susqueda. Very quiet and secluded.

title: (08551) Tona - 4 Carrer Andreu Santasmasas
description: We are Miquel & family, we are travelers with a Van, and we offer secure Storage parking (with 24/7 video) and private external parking at our house. If you need to interrupt your trip, you can leave your vehicle (NOT stay overnight) for 1 week, or even 12 months. Available for Camper, RV motorhomes, Van, small trucks (max. 8m long and 3m high). We can also transfer you to Barcelona or Girona airport in 45min. Displacement apart) . We have a plastic cover for your van. It has the possibility of electricity and water tank with extra cost. We also have an Airb&b for accommodation at home: "a little piece of heaven" Tona-Catalonia (Barcelona) We are waiting for you and your adventures!

title: (17860) Colonia Llaudet - 17 N-260
description: Parking near Sant Joan de les abadesses, very quiet and clean, please keep it, we spent the night very quiet and alone

title: (17530) Campdevànol - 7 Plaça P.p. Pla de Niubo
title_short: (17530) Campdevànol - 7 Plaça P.p. Pla de Niubo
description: Parking area in case you want to do the Ruta dels 7 Gorgs since the closest area has a height limitation (1.95m) and from the information point they refer you to this point of the road (km 2) located in a polygon industrial. Then you have to walk 20 min along a well-marked path to the beginning of the route.

title: (17800) Olot - 2 Carrer Ginestola
description: Water point to recharge before walks around the volcanoes

title: (08619) Borredà - 2 C-26
description: Small car park next to the road to make a stop.

title: (08551) Tona - 27 Avinguda Riambau
description: Unpaved parking area that is used as parking for the climb to the Tona Castle. It is separated from the town, with the Hermitage of Lourdes next to it. It has views but there is no shade. Easy access for motorhomes and campers.

title: (17531) Campdevànol - 7 Barri Sant Llorenç
description: Free picnic area in the middle of nature. It has about fifteen stone tables, with a lot of shade. There are free access barbecues and you can cook with camping sites, but not before mentioning it to the park guard who welcomes you in the parking lot. There you have to park (it closes at 9pm, without the possibility of staying overnight) and you have to walk 100m to the picnic area. Highly recommended to stop for lunch or to do the 7 gorgs route. Height limit 1.95m

name: Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol
title: (17530) Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol
description: Campdevànol, GI-401. Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol. All services and possibility of making the great road of the seven lakes.

title: (08551) Tona - 52 Carrer Antoni Figueras
description: Ample parking perfect for visiting Tona. spending a night is prohibited

title: (17800) Olot - 87 Avinguda de Santa Coloma
description: Shaded parking next to Pekin Park and Carrefour.

title: (17813) Sant Pere Despuig -

title: (17800) Olot - 213 Avinguda Sant Jordi
description: Parking municipal pools. Shady but without service. Used as a shelter for the night.

title: (17800) Olot - 63 C-152
description: Potable water fountain, can access it from the side road.

title: (17800) Olot - 47 Avenida de Santa Coloma
description: PARKING in town in Olot but quiet, ideal for the night, close to the museum of volcanoes and the botanical garden, parking free tourism in any case in this season, large enough and also extends to the other side! There is a cafe in front and a bakery a little further
